description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，中国共产党党员。历任安徽省环保局审计处长、办公室主任，亳州市委常委、秘书长、宣传部长，安徽省委副秘书长、督查室主任，安徽省政府法制办公室主任、副秘书长、办公厅主任，安徽省政协常委、港澳台侨和外事委员会主任。现任安徽省环保联合会主席。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He has served as Director of the Audit Division and Director of the Office of the Anhui Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau; Standing Committee Member, Secretary-General, and Director of the Propaganda Department of the Bozhou Municipal Party Committee; Deputy Secretary-General and Director of the Supervision Office of the Anhui Provincial Party Committee; Director of the Legislative Affairs Office, Deputy Secretary-General, and Director of the General Office of the Anhui Provincial Government; and Standing Committee Member and Director of the Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Overseas Chinese and Foreign Affairs Committee of the Anhui Provincial Political Consultative Conference. He is currently the Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Environmental Protection Federation.

description.zh-cn: 中国的主体民族。
description.en: The dominant ethnic group in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省阜阳市下辖的县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Fuyang City, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾是负责安徽省环境保护工作的省政府组成部门。
description.en: A former component department of the Anhui Provincial Government responsible for environmental protection work in the province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial state administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.en: A former agency under the Anhui Provincial People's Government responsible for legislative affairs.

description.en: The comprehensive administrative office of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Anhui Province.

省政协港澳台侨和外事委员会
en: Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Overseas Chinese and Foreign Affairs Committee of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the Anhui Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省的环保社会组织。
description.en: An environmental social organization in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于安徽省芜湖市的一所省属重点大学。
description.en: A provincial key university located in Wuhu, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 张杰是安徽阜南人。
description.en: Zhang Jie is from Funan, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 张杰是汉族。
description.en: Zhang Jie is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 张杰是中共党员。
description.en: Zhang Jie is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 张杰是安徽师范大学的校友。
description.en: Zhang Jie is an alumnus of Anhui Normal University.

position.en: Director of Audit Division, Director of Office

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾历任安徽省环保局审计处长、办公室主任。
description.en: Zhang Jie successively served as Director of the Audit Division and Director of the Office of the Anhui Provincial Environmental Protection Bureau.

relationships.target: 中国共产党亳州市委员会

position.en: Secretary-General, Standing Committee Member, Director of the Propaganda Department

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任亳州市委秘书长，市委常委、市委秘书长、市委宣传部长。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Secretary-General of the Bozhou Municipal Party Committee, Standing Committee Member of the Municipal Party Committee, Secretary-General of the Municipal Party Committee, and Director of the Propaganda Department of the Municipal Party Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

position.zh-cn: 副秘书长、省委督查室主任
position.en: Deputy Secretary-General, Director of the Provincial Party Committee's Supervision Office

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省委副秘书长、省委督查室主任。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Anhui Provincial Party Committee and Director of the Provincial Party Committee's Supervision Office.

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省政府副秘书长。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Anhui Provincial Government.

relationships.target: 安徽省人民政府法制办公室

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省政府法制办公室主任。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Director of the Legislative Affairs Office of the Anhui Provincial Government.

relationships.target: 安徽省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省政府办公厅主任。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Director of the General Office of the Anhui Provincial Government.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省政协常委。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as a Standing Committee Member of the Anhui Provincial Political Consultative Conference.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议安徽省委员会港澳台侨和外事委员会

description.zh-cn: 张杰曾任安徽省政协港澳台侨和外事委员会主任。
description.en: Zhang Jie served as Director of the Hong Kong, Macao, Taiwan, Overseas Chinese and Foreign Affairs Committee of the Anhui Provincial Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 2022年5月，张杰当选安徽省环保联合会第四届理事会主席。
description.en: In May 2022, Zhang Jie was elected Chairman of the fourth council of the Anhui Provincial Environmental Protection Federation.
